db:info.db:title: WebEngine Qt Quick Custom Dialogs Example

db:abstract.db:para: Customizes UI elements of Qt WebEngine's dialogs.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += webengine
HEADERS += \ server.h
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ server.cpp
RESOURCES += \ customdialogs.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/webengine/customdialogs INSTALLS += target
qtHaveModule(widgets) { QT += widgets # QApplication is required to get native styling with QtQuickControls }
